column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////This is the first time I've ever gone out seeking ramen for dinner
column2: and I gotta say I'm impressed. No wait
column3: even in the afternoon. Friendly staff
column4: and their veggie ramen is incredible. Great atmosphere too
column5: but I'm gonna knock a star just because I wish it was less loud and the single giant table in the center was replaced with several smaller tables.
